events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund. The product I got is different from what was advertised.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product shipment as reported by the customer.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect order item received by the customer.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you received an incorrect product and I’m here to help you get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number so I can process your refund request faster?
Thank you for responding. I have attached the photo of the item I got and my order number is #453221. Please let me know if you need anything else.
Thanks for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and you can expect the money back in 3-5 business days. No need to return the incorrect item.
I appreciate your quick solution and the refund offer. This helps a lot, thank you for making it hassle-free.
Your refund has been processed and the case is now resolved. Please check your account in a few days for the refund amount.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund. If there are any other issues, feel free to reach out anytime.
The case has been formally closed after confirmation of refund receipt and no further concerns from the customer.
We have sent you a short customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience. Your feedback is important to us.
